transcript.title: FOR PRESS : STATEMENT BY THE TREASURER, THE HONORABLE WILLIAM MCMAHON, N.P REGIONAL TAXATION OFFICE TO OPEN AT WOLLONGONG, NEW SOUTH WALES
transcript.content:
NOT TO BE PUBLISHED OR BROADCAST BEFPORE
4.30 P. M. ON THURSDAY 28TH APRIL, 1966
FOR PRESSNO. 350
STATEMENT BY THE TREASURER,
THE HONORABLE WILLIAM McMAHON, M. P.
REGIONAL TAXATION OFFICE TO OPEN
AT WOLLONGONG, NEW SOUTH WALES
The Commonwealth Treasurer, the Hon. William McMahon,
announced today that a branch of the Taxation, Office would be
opening at Wollongong, New South Wales on 2nd May, 1966.
The office will be located in the Manchester Unity
building, corner Keira and Market Streets, Wollongong, and will
operate along similar lines to the now well-established centres
at Canberra and at Newcastle in N. S. W. and Geelong in Victoria.
The facilities to be provided will extend to all taxes
and include the answering of enquiries and receipt of payments.
Taxpayers who find themselves unable to meet their obligations as
to the payment of tax or lodgment of returns by the due date
will also have the opportunity of discussing their problems at
this office.
CANBERRA A. C. T.
28th April, 1966
